author: stas
msg: this is a more advanced protocol implementation. While using a
simplistic socket communication, the protocol uses an almost complete
HTTP AAA (access and authentication, but not authorization, which can
be easily added) provided by mod_auth (but can be implemented in perl
see the protocols.pod document for the explanations of the code

author: randyk
msg: some further tweaks to the building of the static library on Win32
(and potentially others) used by APR/APR::* to resolve symbols outside
- have the name of the library as a configurable option (default: aprext);
- adjust location of the built library under blib/ to take into account
the fact that MP_INST_APACHE2 may not have been used;
- make an install target to install this library under the Apache2 lib/
directory (but don't implement it yet under 'make install;);
